ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a crawler to extract data from websites, which can then be used to create custom GPTs or assistants on OpenAI. It allows for configuration of the crawl parameters such as URL, selectors, and maximum pages. The extracted data is outputted as a JSON file.
